Date: 2024-10-08 21:20
Subject: MAJOR INCIDENT UPDATE: INTERMITTENT SIOCS LOG IN ISSUES 
--------------------------------------------------


 


MAJOR INCIDENT UPDATE: INTERMITTENT SIOCS LOG IN ISSUES 

______________________________________________________________________________

Date: 08 October 2024

Time: 8:57 PM GST




Dear Colleagues,




Please be informed that teams are unable to log in to SIOCS intermittently. Both handheld devices and desktop applications are impacted. Our Tech teams have re-engaged Oracle to investigate and resolve the issue.




If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting the following link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1adc611dd26c4ede627008dce7bd5d82%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638640048092681894%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=8fWcI7QhfFcohYJiHJx%2FI%2FANmbAasxg6bUgAdjE3AN8%3D&reserved=0> .




Alternatively, you can also reach out to us via WhatsApp at +971 48045755 or utilize the chatbot available on the support portal. 




Chalhoub Tech.
